articles.title: Elon Musk shares incredible image of the fuel lines in SpaceX's Super Heavy Booster - Daily Mail
articles.description: Elon Musk shared an image of the fuel lines inside SpaceX's Raptor engine. The maze of pipes look similar to Star Wars' Sarlacc - a beast buried in the sand, with only a mouth full of teeth visible.
articles.content: SpaceX CEO Elon Musk tweeted an image of the Raptor Engine system part of the Super Heavy booster that will eventually power its massive Starship vehicle into orbit - and it looks like something out … [+4954 chars]
